```{r}
library(p8105.datasets)
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
```

```{r}
data("instacart")
```

## Barplot
```{r}
instacart %>% 
  count(aisle) %>% 
  filter(n > 10000) %>% 
  mutate(aisle = fct_reorder(aisle, n)) %>% 
  plot_ly(
    x = ~aisle, y = ~n, type = "bar"
  )
```
